content: How long would it take you to get to Los Angeles by car?

As an AI assistant, I don't have a physical form or the ability to travel, so I can't drive to Los Angeles or any other location. However, I'm here to help answer any questions you have or provide information about Los Angeles or driving times in general. If you're planning a road trip to Los Angeles, I can help estimate the travel time based on your starting point. Just let me know where you're starting from!
